website_summaries.verdict: A premium eco-friendly bamboo caddy from a socially conscious manufacturer that donates a portion of their profits to a global children's feeding program.
pros: Natural bamboo construction is solid and sturdy
Well thought-out design takes care of every detail from phones and tablets or books to wine glasses and candles
Generous extendable arms fit just about any tub and come with non-slip grips to prevent sliding
Great customer service from an environmentally considerate company
cons: Wine glass slot doesn’t fit every type of glass
Some owners feel the tablet stand leans back a bit too far

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!! No slip with small lip on tub!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't review most products I purchase, but I had to for future purchasers. I have a miniscule (1/2-1/4 inch) lip on the wall side of my tub and this still didn't slip. Even when I slid it back and forth adjusting to where I was sitting in the tub. Everything I needed to relax at home!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret J McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife as a early Valentine's Day gift. She loves it! Sturdy construction...she had it full of stuff and our cat decided to have a look at the same time. Didn't crack or bend like some of the others claim. Having a cat on this of course isn't normal usage and will not be a common event. She's already used it 3 times in the few days she's had it. I'll put a followup review in about 45 days. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Caddy!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived packaged well and it gorgeous. I love everything about it. The fact that they also help kids eat with a portion of the proceeds is a bonus. It is why I am regretting that I have to send it back. Not for any defects because it is perfect and just what I wanted, however, the tub in our rental is just way too small. It would not work at all. That's my fault for not measuring beforehand but other than that please purchase from this amazing seller. They make sure you have an excellent customer service experience.
customer_reviews.author: MrzWill

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath tray. It’s very sturdy, was packaged neat and secure and was already assembled! I have enough room to place my tablet (not in pic) comfortably and securely on it as well as a wine glass , cup of water, candle, appetizers (pictured). Talk about the mix of relaxation, convenience and comfort .... As a mother of 3, the bath tub is my new “ME TIME” getaway lol. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bath mate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bath caddy that has everything I could possibly need to make my bath time perfect. The wine holder, iPad/book holder, phone holder, soap holder... they thought of everything. And I LOVE the bamboo. It’s so solid and sturdy, but it looks so beautiful. The rubber grips are great at keeping it in place, too. What I love about it is that it fits perfectly in my tub without me even needing to expand it at all. It’s as if it was made for my tub.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fits my wine glass, holds my 10.5 inch iPad in a heavy ottorbox case and I can’t complain. There have been some critical reviews in regards to ease of movie watching so thought I’d share a photo of how I watch. I have a Popsocket on the back of my iPad and I lean the tablet holder forward so it rests between my Popsocket and the back of the tablet case. It’s very sturdy and I do not fear it will fall. The only reason I give 4 instead of 5 stars is because one small side piece on the removable tray insert came loose right out of the box and needed glue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product - all the positive comments I had read ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product - all the positive comments I had read are accurate. Seems good quality; I don't see why it would break. As others may have mentioned, some wine glasses will not fit - the bottom would have to be quite flat. I personally don't care about that. I might see if I can modify it anyway, or just fill in the hole with something, or maybe I can find a glass or two at the store that will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Mendelson

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: After less than 5 uses a piece of the bamboo fell off of one of the compartments. It was an easy fix, but dont knock this thing around too much. I am not a fan of the logo on the product, but regardless I didn't know how much I needed one of these things. No more setting my drinks, phone, or bath accessories on the edge of the tub! Great idea for a mother's day gift.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my new caddy!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived today. I haven’t used it yet but I inspected it and fitted in my bathtub which only has about a half inch of space on the other side. I’m very happy that it held well and the other side kind of secure it in place plus that silicon at the bottom really gave it an additional grip. I’m very excited and can’t wait to use it, this time I won’t ever think soaking in a tub is the most boring thing to do ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: A couple tweaks and it would be perfect
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it! My only complaint is that you cannot adjust the book/iPad/kindle holder to stand straight up. It lays back at an angle, making the view a bit off. Also difficult to hold an iPhone, ipad, kindle HD, with any type of thick case or otter box. However, it is made very well, and fits snugly across our wide jetted tub.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Luxury bathtub caddy I am so glad I purchased!!!
customer_reviews.text: Expands over a large bath tub. Can sit in a bathtub and watch a video or a movie on your phone or tablet. Can light a candle and put a drink on this caddy. Can put a little plate with a snack. Takes bathtub experience to the next level. Made of quality wood.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to any tub
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! It's an absolute necessity for all lovers of a good bath. My only complaint and reason for the one start deduction is that the stand goes back a little bit too far. I wish my tablet or phone could be just a touch more upright.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality item
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift, I did open it to make sure it was not broken. It was well packaged a a beautiful piece, very nice quality. I am sure it will be used and appreciated. I tried the wine glass feature and the glass slid right into the slot, the reader will hold your kindle nicely. The silicone gripper on the bottom will keep the unit in place.
customer_reviews.author: Robert uhl

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: My amazing husband gave me this as part of my Christmas present. I didn't know how it would fit, but it does so easily. It is made very well and adjusts easily. I never thought about getting one of these for myself, and I'm grateful my husband thought of it. Reading and soaking are two of my favorite things.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Takes up space.
customer_reviews.text: I had to get ride of mine after about a month because mold started to grow. It also doesn’t fouls up so it’s hard to stash if your not using it. Over all unless your just a bath person, think twice.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Cute for small tablets
customer_reviews.text: I like the look but the table stand isn’t wide enough to hold a kindle fire 10 on its side and standing upright doesn’t seem sturdy enough to trust.
customer_reviews.author: M. Guyot

customer_reviews.title: My helper
customer_reviews.text: I like the set up of the tray. So light and convenient. I purchased this item as a gift for my wife for when she bathes and she loves it! She can sit back, relax while sipping on some wine and/or watching a movie on your tablet. The only problem I have now is getting my wife out the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My only issue is that I have a very deep free standing tub and so I can't really relax and lay back in the tub and be able to read very well because I am lower than the tray itself. But I don't know that there is any way around that because it would be sitting in the water otherwise. I love that it is adjustable too!
customer_reviews.author: nurse eli

customer_reviews.title: Seemed perfect but arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: So sad, this arrived broken. It's stable and seemed perfect for my bathtub. Unfortunately, arrived damaged even though the shipping box was not. The removable tray was in pieces and one of the no slip, protective rubber grips on the underside was completely missing. Have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: High quality, perfect, and no assembly! I can't believe I didn't buy this sooner. Also, the company reached out the day it arrived to make sure it wasn't broken or anything, and I love that.
customer_reviews.author: susan weber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This bath tub caddy was as advertised and perfect. The construction is solid and very functional. My wife loves this for her claw foot tub! The iPad holder is excellent and sturdy and the rubber pads underneath the arms that rest on the tub are a nice feature to provide a non-slip function. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: GRB

customer_reviews.title: I like the caddy because it is the only one I ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the caddy because it is the only one I found that extends far enough across the jetted tub and deck. Unfortunately, it has a broken component which is not essential but is a holder on the right side. I was going to send it back and get another one but then the price jumped higher so I decided to keep it. I will be able to repair it. The wood is pretty but the caddy is very slippery against the tub and deck so it is important to keep it extended so everything doesn't get dumped into the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good but Reading Shelf Needs Adjustments
customer_reviews.text: So far this caddy has been pretty nice. The only problem is that the reading shelf keeps falling over, which makes me wary about using it with my iPad. If the metal knobs were 1/4 inch longer I think this wouldn't be a problem. Overall, however, it's a pretty great caddy for taking baths in.
customer_reviews.author: glasuri

customer_reviews.title: Not overly sturdy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged when it came out of the package. ONe of the adjustable sides had come apart so I re-glued and stapled it and one of the rubber non-slip foot pads had come off and was tangled in the plastic wrap. Works OK. It is a bit wobbly when fully extended so on a wide soaker tub like ours I would not recommend it. On a regular size tub it would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: COULD NOT BE MORE PLEASED!
customer_reviews.text: I did extensive research before I purchased this bathtub caddy tray and my expectations were exceeded when it arrived! The deciding factor for me was the rubber grippers to keep the tray from accidentally slipping into the tub. It also has an extra deep and wide slot that accommodates my favorite wine glasses. Love this tray and highly recommend it for a gift or a "pamper yourself" treat! And of course, the price was great and it arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hillard

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and comes packaged good but the product itself arrived damaged/broken. Not impressed with the quality for the money was hoping it would have been better made given the other reviews but no such luck. I would say take your chances maybe yours won't come broken. It is great size and what we were looking for overall just wish we didn't have to put it back together with nails and glue just to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer in MN

customer_reviews.title: My dreams have come true!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly perfect for all my bath tub needs. Which are alot. I take a bath every night to unwind, and i really couldn't ask for more in a product.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Until I tried to get a caddy for our tub, I hadn't even realized the tub was unusually wide at 29 inches. It has been hard to find a caddy to fit; the ones that did, would slip into the tub when bumped because they just barely fit. This caddy not only fits with inches to spare, it is beautiful. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing bath
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today and I am looking forward to taking a nice warm bath by candlelight. Love the ability to put my ipad on it to listen to music. Thinking this will be a nice gift for my daughters. Very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, eco friendly, luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Comes fully assembled. Very sturdy and stable, with adjustable width to fit the tub accordingly. I love this caddy and I am so happy with my purchase. All compartments are solid and this will take luxurious baths and aromatherapy sessions to the next level. I love that it is eco friendly and doesn’t compromise on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Meg H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! I got this as a gift for my birthday and it is beautiful. The no slip grips on the bottom are great so I dont have to worry about it scratching my tub. And it looks perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MCarrasco

customer_reviews.title: it is superior in that it has rubber underneath on the corners ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this product did not come up first on Amazon, it is superior in that it has rubber underneath on the corners that keeps it from sliding on the tub. The product that came up first did not have these rubber areas. Since both of these were very similar, I am so glad I choose this one instead! In addition, the way the top slides to meet the sides of the tub, an open area is created on each side over the inside of the tub so that you can hang a wet washcloth to dry! It is a beautiful Bamboo Caddy Tray that enhances our marble bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best value for your money. My wife loves it! Some parts weren't fully sanded, but just barely and nothing 2 min and a piece of sandpaper couldn't handle.
customer_reviews.author: maXtreme477

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to my wife and she absolutely loves it. The product arrived sooner than expected, meets our expectations, and looks great. We will definitely purchase through elite instincts again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Dunning

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product!!! It works incredibly well and is the perfect size because it is adjustable!! I love being able do have a nice drink in the bath while enjoying a book of watching a show. It is a great gift as well! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather H. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful caddy!
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is wonderful with a place for a book or iPad, beverage, and still more slots for other item. It is also plenty long to fit across our large tub. It is adjustable. It arrived on time in great condition. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: LKClements

customer_reviews.title: Everything you want in a bathtub caddy (+ Great Customer Service!)
customer_reviews.text: I came back to write a review because this was everything I wanted for a bathtub caddy: hold my phone, wine, book, and more, it's incredibly lightweight, and it fits my bathtub. The customer service I received was outstanding as well. The first caddy I received was defective. I reached out to the seller and got a very speedy response and they sent a replacement out almost immediately. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love I!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, I had high hopes for this, but it has exceeded them for sure. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M Hemming

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works great 👍 fits great kept everything on the tray instead of in bath water 🤣 Thank you
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Linkens

customer_reviews.title: I love this! And it fits our jacuzzi size tub
customer_reviews.text: I love this! And it fits our jacuzzi size tub! It was hard finding a nice quality one that would fit and be sturdy! Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Eliana

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I love this I have a new garden tub and want a spa feel, I wish I had extra trays to fit in the stretch but I love it! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: lisa pfeil

customer_reviews.title: If you love to soak in the tub, this is perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for standard size bathtubs. My daughters both love theirs. Hold cell phones, wine glass, coffee cup, book, tablet with a splash guard. and a soap dish too!
customer_reviews.author: book reader

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is very classy. I wondered about the caddy slipping from the lip of the tub but it holds onto the edge perfectly. It has plenty of room for a book or magazine and turns bath time into spa time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: J Koss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: "Package was delayed due to an error at Amazon. Seller was extremely helpful in working with Amazon to ensure it arrived by Valentine's day. The product is very sturdy. The rubber feet both protect the tub and keep it from moving. the canvas flip up support is sturdy enough to hold an ipad pro and a book light without fear of one or both falling into the water. Wife and i are both extremely happy."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy from somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a zero I would. It came broken and falling apart. The cheap pieces were held together with glue. Would definitely not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Love the non slip grip sides
customer_reviews.text: Love that this tray has a spot to hold my phone, tablet, a candle, as well as a drink. It even has an extra spot for a snack or something else. It came with a floating soap tray, but I’m not sure I’ll use that.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Johns

customer_reviews.title: Great Tray - Great Features
customer_reviews.text: I love that this fits between my glass shower door and the side of my tub. I had to give a slight whack to make it all the way in but darn it it is sturdy!! I love all the different cubbies for my iPad, wine glass, and hey even my wine bottle. Don’t judge me.
customer_reviews.author: Molly S

customer_reviews.title: Wide enough
customer_reviews.text: Great product, feels very sturdy. I was worried it wouldn’t fit the width of our jacuzzi tub, but it fits like a champ! Thanks for a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: stacy filozof

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It fits really well as advertised. It was purchased as a gift. It looks like it will hold up well. The only issue we have is storage when not in use or else would have given it 5 stars. Just don't know where to put it when the shower is used. Being able to hang it on a hook behind the door would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy; it’s a  game changer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Love the adjustable width to accommodate a variety of tubs. Very well made. The back support sling in the center is much smaller than my iPad Pro but books should be well supported
customer_reviews.author: Jerri L. Sutter

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my granddaughter to use while she is ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my granddaughter to use while she is soaking in the tub. Quality product, well made, and so far she is enjoying the freedom of being able to read in the tub without getting her book wet :)
customer_reviews.author: MamawMary H

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not fit average tub
customer_reviews.text: I would have giving it 5stars if it wasn't for the fact that it doesn't really fit a traditional tub, it hangs off and it's not adjustable enough to make fit
customer_reviews.author: TRINETTE SMITH

customer_reviews.title: ... mins while i watch my amazon prime series - love
customer_reviews.text: i totally use this when i put myself in timeout away from the kids for 10-20 mins while i watch my amazon prime series - love it
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice product, very pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, very pretty, and fits across my really large jetted tub. I was worried it would slip since my tub does not have sides, but it stays put.
customer_reviews.author: David Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Real nice quality product, fits our oversized tub just fine.
customer_reviews.author: DTSDA

customer_reviews.title: Beauty,function, superior quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, crafted bath tub caddy! I ordered for a double slipper copper tub, and wanted something that would look great with my tub. This caddy is all that, and very useful with holder for wine glass or mug, tablet, and or book. And it came with a lovely separate soap dish. I love it!!! You will too!
customer_reviews.author: nmsundance

customer_reviews.title: The fit is nice for our large garden bath tub
customer_reviews.text: The fit is nice for our large garden bath tub. However, I had to glue some of the pieces that kept coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Yulonda Biddell

customer_reviews.title: Good, could be a tiny bit better...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. They thought of everything. Mine is missing anti-slip strips on the feet of 1 side. I’ll have to find something to attach. Makes me concerned it could slip into the tub. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it and uses it to relax in the tub
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love my bath tray. And what wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: A. Earl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift now want one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product! Adjustable yet very stable on my 30" wide soaker tub edges. There are soft grips on the bottom of the tray, so it doesn't slip. The tray is beautiful, with plenty of room for reading, cell phone, and drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy = peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this bath caddy also has room for many items. I love how very sturdy it is especially since I have my iPad and books on it. But my favorite thing is once you open the package they inform you that some of their profit goes to a Feed the Cildren organization.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Beaautiful
customer_reviews.text: Made our Garden Tub look truly luxurious when our house was for sale. It is a well-made, well-designed item.
customer_reviews.author: JSH

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and feels sturdy. Haven't actually used it while bathing yet, who has time for a bath, but it fits perfectly on our large tub without slipping. Only thing that would make it even better is if there were extra compartments you could purchase to slot into the caddy. Having the ability to customize it would be amazing. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful, yet very useful tray!
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can use it regardless of the size of your bathtub sides
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to give my wife for Valentine’s Day. It fit her tub perfectly and she uses it nightly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: john casero

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: It is really lovely! I was worried it might not be wide enough for my tub, but it fit with room to spare. I was impressed with the quality and attention to detail in the design!
customer_reviews.author: Jane D. Hettich

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is everything you want it to be!! Well made, beautiful and functional. I may never come out of my bathtub!
customer_reviews.author: Marlis Cook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for relaxing in the bubbles with a book.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed bathtub tray. It is well made and the design is perfect for a relaxing soak in the tub with my favorite book on my nook.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Looks real nice in her bathroom and very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend for a housewarming gift and she just loves it! Looks real nice in her bathroom and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to comfortably fit across my soaking tub
customer_reviews.text: The bathtub caddy is just what I wanted. Large enough to comfortably fit across my soaking tub. Lisa at Elite Instincts was extremely responsive to my dismay at the first caddy being received broken. She responded promptly to my emails and followed up to make sure I was completely satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product exceeded my expectations. It is well constructed ...
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. It is well constructed and has little bells and whistles that I appreciate such as a slot for a wine glass, a stand to prop up a table and a bamboo soap dish. It fit well over my soaking tub. The addition of having some of the money for it go to charity for children is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Falls

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accompaniment to my relaxing bath!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Looks great, very sturdy and has all the compartments I wanted for max "bath time"-- iPad/book holder, wine holder, cup holder, soap dish and other little spaces for items like a bud vase, for example. It's much nicer (sturdier) than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Sauer

customer_reviews.title: This caddy is amazing I absolutely LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is amazing I absolutely LOVE it! It keeps everything you need organized in one perfect place in front of you. Before it was all over the place and hard to get to while bathing. This is a PERFECT solution! It has made taking a bath much more fun, comfortable and enjoyable. What a brilliant idea!!! Keep up the good work you are doing! A Raving Fan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely addition to our new bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as expected, and fit perfectly on the sides of our bathtub! Can’t wait to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Rami Hage-Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had an excellent experience with Elite Instincts. I had ordered a bath caddy for my wife's Christmas present, and she loved it. It arrived right on time and was exactly what she wanted...a chic, multi-functional caddy that's convenient for reading, drinking, candles, etc. Looks great in the bathroom too. The company's customer service was especially good.
customer_reviews.author: clay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice piece at a very nice price. Attractive, well made and highly practical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I love the tray! Well built and the rubber grips protect my tub and keep it from sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoys her bath time and she loves this caddy.
customer_reviews.author: KDBUG

customer_reviews.title: it's amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The bath tub caddy was a gift for my daughter. She has a claw foot bathtub and loves how wide it opens to fit across. It has a place for a wine glass, phone, book, iPad, candle ...it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't lock from sliding ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made item and it would be great if there was a way to lock, to prevent from sliding, when storing it.
customer_reviews.author: Disenchanted

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift. Very nice and sturdy. Lives up to description. Would be better with a different hooking area for the edge of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Little

customer_reviews.title: A great tub addition.
customer_reviews.text: My wife enjoys having this for her tub soaks. Very nice with the silicon non slip grips.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Guy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This bath tray is very well made and sturdy. A big plus for me is the wood below the area that supports your book or tablet-keeps them dry. I have a narrow tub of 29 1/2", but it stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Quality poor see picture of soap dish holder. I am handy so I will glue and nail it. Not impressed with book holder. The positive, it does fit our tub.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Steffey

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the bathtub caddy I purchased. It is well made, is just as advertised and works great. I received it in a very timely manner. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: David Becher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, good quality tray
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, good quality tray. Great customer service too! Our Caddy arrived missing a piece, and Elite Instincts contacted me, offering a replacement immediately. The new one came and was perfect. Don't hesitate to order!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bath caddy!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful design and craftsmanship. Fits a wide variety of tub sizes. Stays firmly on the edge--doesn't slip. Excellent product--highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ChouChou

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bamboo caddy. Adjustable to fit multiple tub widths.
customer_reviews.author: John 14:6

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend and it is a great piece. Very sturdy and I love the rubber grips that sit on the tub that allows it to not slide out of place.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Carleton

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my wife for Valentine’s Day She loves it and uses it. Great for the significant other who loves a nice long bath.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Warden

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Received the product faster then expected which was wonderful. The bathtub caddy is nicer in person than the pictures show. I am so happy I decided on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Reading just got easier!
customer_reviews.text: The bathtub caddy was a birthday gift. As far as I know it is working just fine for some relaxing reading in the tub. Thinking of getting one for me!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri L.

customer_reviews.title: Mommy time
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for reading a book and drinking some wine during mommy time!
customer_reviews.author: carmen o pagan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 5 Year Wedding Anniversary Gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for our 5 year wedding anniversary (traditional theme is wood). We just had our bathroom re-done with a new freestanding tub. What a perfect gift. Arrived quickly and is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Irish

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and sturdy, iPad and a glass of wine for a ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a large soaking tub. This bamboo caddy fit perfectly and was just what we were looking for. Very well made and sturdy, iPad and a glass of wine for a nice relaxing bath.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and elegant, with more than enough space for book/tablet/phone/drink and more (!). It feels sturdy and is easily adjustable to fit most bathtubs. We’re enjoying it greatly, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: I.A.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this a gift for one of my best friends who would basically live in her bathtub if ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a gift for one of my best friends who would basically live in her bathtub if she could. After receiving this she just might!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tray
customer_reviews.text: Love this tray just don’t like that it doesn’t adjust a little smaller for my tub
customer_reviews.author: Paige Pilar

product_meta.title: Pristine Bamboo Bathtub Caddy - Eco-Friendly, Waterproof, Book, Wine, iPad Holder - Expandable Wood Tray for Bath - for Uninterrupted Relaxing
feature_bullets: IDILLYAC GIFTS FOR WOMEN: For those who enjoy a luxury bath, Pristine Bamboo bath caddy tops unique bathtub accessories. Featuring compartments to hold a book, candles, wine glass, cell phone, and more.

NON-SLIP BATH SHELF: Prevent accidents with the silicone grip bottoms that keep this portable bamboo bathtub tray in place on a ceramic or cast iron bathtub, even sides with a narrow ‘lip’. Adjustable to fit a small bathtub to a large garden tub.
CREATE YOUR OWN SPA: This adjustable bath table caddy expands from 29.5 to 43 inches in width, making it suitable for all standard bathtub sizes. Perfect for bathrooms with minimal counter space.

ALL-INCLUSIVE: This beautiful bath rack has a removable book holder with a water-resistant cover and 3 reading angles. It also features a smartphone holder, spill-proof wine glass slot and a multipurpose, detachable vanity tray.

OUR PROMISE OF EXCELLENCE: If you are unsatisfied, send us an email and we WILL resolve the issue. We are so confident in the quality of our bathtub caddy tray that we provide a 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE.
